description:
This course Does Not cover the latest Adobe Photoshop CC - and is for CS5 downwards using the original interface.

Over 700 student are already taking advantage of this course

Your instructor for this course will be Reynel who will take you step by step through working with designing vector images with Adobe Photoshop

In this exciting course for beginners You will learn the basics, As well as the differences between these and standard format images such as JPEG or Bitmap images.

Once you have the basic knowledge you can go on to compound upon your knowledge.

Course contents

. Welcome to the Course
. Working with the all powerful pen tool
. Lets start designing a Vector graphic
. Outputting correctly for print and the web
. Course Conclusion

Once you know the principles of working with Vector images you can go on to create scalable images for both the web and print.

Remember that there is absolutely NO risk to you. You are covered by the rock solid Udemy No quibble Money Back Guarantee for a full 30 days. If the course does not teach you exactly what it promises to then simply request a refund, It's as simple as that.
title: A Beginners Guide to creating Vector Graphics With Photoshop
